plugins.name: claude-vision
plugins.description: Visual context skills for Claude Code - clipboard, screenshots, video analysis, and image search

plugins.name: claude-vault
plugins.description: Secure secrets handling for Claude Code - run API calls without exposing keys in session logs

plugins.name: claude-notifications
plugins.description: Sounds, OS notifications, and task timing for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-browser
plugins.description: Control your real browser from Claude - navigate, click, type, screenshot

plugins.name: claude-discipline
plugins.description: AI accountability system - track mistakes, deliver consequences, reward good behavior

plugins.name: claude-continue
plugins.description: Auto-continue Claude until task completion - self-perpetuating agent loop

plugins.name: claude-brain-surgery
plugins.description: Externalize Claude's auto-memory into your project directory — git-committable, portable, collaboratively editable

plugins.name: claude-claudorepo
plugins.description: Fleet-wide multi-repo coordination — manage claudorepos with /claudo commands
